# D  {#sec-D.unnumbered}



In this part of the book we will look at the geoms starts with letter "d" or "D".



```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
geomd <- c('geom_d')
sectiond <- c(6.1)
dfd <- data.frame(geom = geomd,
                  section = sectiond)
dfd |> knitr::kable() 
```
